CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 移动；转移；处理；摆脱；推卸；转嫁（责任）；改变（方向、态度、观点、策略等）；换挡；改穿（衣服）；轮班工作；换班；去除（污渍）；变速（驾驶中）；（通过努力）获得；赚取；销售；出售
班；班次；轮班；转变；转换；变换；变化；变速；改变；转移；移位；换挡；偏移；策略；手段；（旧时妇女穿的）宽松直筒连衣裙；直筒式内衣；（计算机键盘或打字机上的）转换键；换档键

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般表示转送或移交迁移，尤指交通运输中的换乘或职务的调动等。
作“移动”解时，与move可换用，还可指撤职或开除学藉等。
侧重位置与方向的改变。
普通用词，指从一处到另一外的任何距离的转移。

word_group.brief_definition: 换挡杆；变速杆；换挡变速杆
二次变换；中班；非出煤班
自力更生, 单独应付
变速杆；换挡杆；齿轮变速手柄

bilingual.source: We are witnessing a significant shift in technology.
bilingual.target: 我们正在目击技术上的重大转变。

bilingual.source: Understanding MMT requires a shift in traditional economic thinking.
bilingual.target: 理解现代货币理论需要转变传统的经济思维。

bilingual.source: The company's attitudinal shift towards sustainability is commendable.
bilingual.target: 公司的态度的转变向可持续性发展是值得称赞的。

bilingual.source: The shift in cultural paradigm has influenced many aspects of society.
bilingual.target: 文化范例的转变影响了社会的许多方面。

bilingual.source: The worship of Aton marked a significant shift in Egyptian religious practices.
bilingual.target: 对阿顿的崇拜标志着埃及宗教实践的重大转变。

bilingual.source: The worship of Aten marked a significant shift in Egyptian religious practices.
bilingual.target: 对阿顿的崇拜标志着埃及宗教实践的重大转变。

bilingual.source: The shift towards a multipolar economic system has significant implications for global trade.
bilingual.target: 向多极的经济体系转变对全球贸易有重大影响。

bilingual.source: The shift from manual jobs to IT ones.
bilingual.target: 从体力工作到IT工作的转变。

bilingual.source: A shift in the view of fire has taken place.
bilingual.target: (人们)对火的看法发生了转变。

bilingual.source: This will, though, require a huge cultural shift.
bilingual.target: 然而，这需要一个巨大的文化转变。

list.abstract: shift，英文单词，作动词、名词，翻译为快速移动、改变观点、推卸（责任）、振作、移位、去除（污迹）、换挡、上档转换键等。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to understand that this a paradigm shift. We have to start thinking beyond politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须明白这是种模式的转变，我们必须开始考虑超越政治范畴的问题了。

yingyinNormal.en: Romilly. Yeah? How far off from Miller's planet do we have to be to stay out of the time shift? Just back from the cusp.
yingyinNormal.zh: Romilly。什么？我们要离Miller的星球多远才能避免时间发生转变？只要离开波峰就行。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to shift the suspicion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得转移怀疑目标。

yingyinNormal.en: There is no coffee prepped for your shift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们这班的咖啡都没准备好。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh, hello? Your shift at the diner started five minutes ago!
yingyinNormal.zh: 姐两位？你们五分钟前就该到餐厅开工了！

yingyinNormal.en: And if I were to shift my weight, I would become a wire walker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要身体的重心一改变，我就成了走钢索人。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Howard, heads up. Your ex-girlfriend just came in for her shift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，注意了，你的前女友来上班了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's been less than 24 hours. She quits her job in the middle of a shift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不到24小时，她正在上班，就突然辞职了。

yingyinNormal.en: It took me two hours to get her down. Oh, you, you relax, I'll take this shift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我花了两个小时才把她哄睡。你歇着，这回我来。

yingyinNormal.en: Shift your hunting ground for a few years and everyone forgets how the Law works.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这片猎场到你手里才几年，所有人都忘了法则是怎么说的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Every effort to save us, every shift in the bricks, I think this will set it off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每当人们想法子救我们，每次砖瓦的移动，我都觉得会引爆那枚炮弹。

yingyinNormal.en: You work the lunch shift? Yeah. I've got eight pounds of salmon that's about to go bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是中午的班呀？是啊，我还带了八磅快坏的鲑鱼回来。

yingyinNormal.en: I've just worked a 12-hour shift and I just want to see where this goes. Mmm-kay? Mmm-kay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚上完12个小时的班，我很想知道我这屁股有没有可能坐下。明白？明白。

yingyinNormal.en: And you should be careful when checking your overhead bins. Because items may shift during.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你检查行李箱的时候要小心，很容易和别人的搞混的。

yingyinNormal.en: I spoke to her and her manager who confirmed with CCTV that she was on a shift. Checks out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我和她以及她的经理谈过话了经理看过监控确认了她当时在上班。不在场证明对得上。

yingyinNormal.en: So, then, during my afternoon shift, I spilled an entire tray of drinks on myself. Oh, that's awful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我下午上班的时候，我不小心把整托盘的饮料全撒身上了。好惨啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe it. If I hadn't been working the dinner shift I would've run right into the robbers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太难以置信了，要不是我一直在餐厅上班，我可就和盗贼正面相遇了。

yingyinNormal.en: I know! That's all I made? What's this? "12 years a waitress"? With you, it's more like "12 beers a shift."
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊！我薪水就这么点吗？这算啥啊？"为奴婢12年"吗？你是"一班12瓶酒"吧。

yingyinNormal.en: What if we take a wider orbit around Gargantua, parallel with Miller's planet outside of this time shift, to here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是我们绕卡冈图亚走更大的轨道，与Miller的星球平行，避开时间变化区，到这里。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Raju Hossain, and he works for Domino's. So how long does your shift usually last? Eight hours, nine hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是拉杜·侯赛因 他是达美乐的员工。你一班上多久？八九个小时。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 换挡杆；变速杆；换挡变速杆

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不断变化的；不断移动的

word_family.mean: v. 转移；移动；振作起来；变换身体位置；转变；〈英；非正式〉 快速移动；非正式〉 活动一下；移位；去污

sense_info_list.en: a change in position or direction

examination_example.sentence: While the rest of the world takes the lead, notably China and Europe, the United States is also seeing a remarkable <highlight>shift</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界其他国家，尤其是中国和欧洲领先的同时，美国也在经历着显著的转变。

examination_example.sentence: The BIO recently held a convention which included sessions to coach lawyers on the <highlight>shifting</highlight> landscape for patents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: BIO最近召开了一个会议，其中包括就不断变化的专利环境来对律师进行指导的会议。

examination_example.sentence: Over time, the attributes of greatness <highlight>shifted</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，“伟大”的特征发生了改变。

sense_info_list.en: move or cause to move from one place to another, especially over a small distance

examination_example.sentence: Most of the money would come from a penny-per-letter permanent rate increase and from <highlight>shifting</highlight> postal retirees into Medicare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大部分资金将来自每封信一便士的永久性加息，以及将邮政退休人员移入医疗保险。

examination_example.sentence: It's as if you're driving a stick <highlight>shift</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就好像你在开手动挡。

sense_info_list.en: one of two or more recurring periods in which different groups of workers do the same jobs in relay
to make somebody else responsible for something you should do or something bad that you have done
to remove something such as a dirty mark
to sell goods, especially goods that are difficult to sell

word_usage.usage: shift between A and B 表示“在A与B之间摇摆”；
shift也可作可数名词，意为“转变”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 轮班; 轮班工作时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: change the emphasis, direction, or focus of

examination_example.sentence: I think sometimes people need to <highlight>shift</highlight> their mindsets around how they receive feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，有时人们需要改变他们接受反馈的心态。

examination_example.sentence: Creating a gap between her income and spending required a paradigm <highlight>shift</highlight> and entailed sacrifice and commitment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在她的收入和支出之间创造差距需要范式转变，需要做出牺牲和承诺。

examination_example.sentence: He brought about a fundamental <highlight>shift</highlight> in the way we communicate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他给我们的交流方式带来了根本性的转变。

sense_info_list.en: move or cause to move from one place to another, especially over a small distance
one of two or more recurring periods in which different groups of workers do the same jobs in relay
sense_info_list.zh: 轮班; 轮班工作时间

exam_freq_info.chinese: 轮班; 轮班工作时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: change the emphasis; direction; or focus of

examination_example.sentence: I feel like this is a <highlight>shift</highlight> away form a subject matter-based curriculum to a more experiential curriculum or learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得这是一种基于学科主题的课程向体验式课程或学习的转变。

examination_example.sentence: In 1962, 50% of Americans were married by age 21. By 2014, that milestone (里程碑) had <highlight>shifted</highlight> to age 29.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1962年，50%的美国人在21岁之前结婚。到2014年，这一里程碑已经变成了29岁。

examination_example.sentence: It's still in its early stages, but I think it's <highlight>shifting</highlight> around not what kids learn but how they learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种转变还处于初级阶段，但我认为它改变的不是孩子们学什么，而是怎么学。

examination_example.sentence: While there are numerous factors behind these <highlight>shifts</highlight>, one factor is surely a growing realization for the young that they are going to live longer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些转变背后有很多因素，但有一个因素无疑是年轻人越来越意识到他们的寿命会更长。

examination_example.sentence: As what happened with tobacco, this will require a cultural <highlight>shift</highlight>, but that can happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如吸烟所发生的事情一样，这将需要文化转变，但这是可以发生的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Shifting</highlight> eating habits, including a sharp drop in consumption of sparkling drinks, have forced radical change on the industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饮食习惯的转变，包括气泡饮料消费量的急剧下降，迫使该行业发生了根本性的变化。

examination_example.sentence: Those <highlight>shifts</highlight> have yet to be reflected in record obesity levels, which stand at 36.5% overall in the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些转变尚未反映在创纪录的肥胖水平中，美国的肥胖率大体上为36.5%。

sense_info_list.en: move or cause to move from one place to another; especially over a small distance

examination_example.sentence: Employers argue they make considerable savings on real estate when workers <highlight>shift</highlight> from office to home work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雇主们称，当员工从办公室转移到家庭工作时，他们可以在房地产上省下一大笔钱。

sense_info_list.en: one of two or more recurring periods in which different groups of workers do the same jobs in relay
sense_info_list.zh: 轮班; 轮班工作时间

examination_example.sentence: The café is open in the mornings every day of the year and has two members of staff or supervisors on <highlight>shift</highlight> every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 咖啡馆每年早上都开放，每天都有两名员工或主管值班。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: change the emphasis, direction, or focus of

examination_example.sentence: In pre-Classical Greece, for instance, people "corrected" official calendars by <highlight>shifting</highlight> dates forward or backward to reflect the change of season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在前古典希腊，人们通过将日期向前或向后移动以反映季节的变化来“纠正”官方日历。

examination_example.sentence: It's better to leave your listeners wishing for more than <highlight>shifting</highlight> restlessly in their seats waiting for your speech finally to end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好让你的听众想要听到更多，而不是在座位上坐立不安地等待你讲完。

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, these programs can <highlight>shift</highlight> people's wish of participation from an internal factor to an external factor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，这些项目会将人们参与的愿望从一个内部因素转移到一个外部因素。
